# Critics' Choice Super Award for Best Actor in an Action Movie

The '''Critics' Choice Super Award for Best Actor in an Action Movie' is an award presented by the Critics Choice Association to the best performance by an actor in an action film.
This award was first presented in 2021 to Delroy Lindo for his role as Paul on Da 5 Bloods. The most nominated actor in this category is Tom Cruise with three consecutive nominations and wins.
The current recipient of the award is Tom Cruise for his role as Ethan Hunt in Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning.
